content:
How DAV Differs from Normal HTTP

  • Request Vs. Action

    • GET/PUT/DELETE - Cause a Result
    • COPY/MOVE/DAV DELETE/LOCK/CHECK IN/OUT/ETC. - Request a Result

  • Multiple Actions - One Request

  • Client to Server Communication not Server to Server (How does one copy a resource anyway?)
